backend.label: :backend:
backend.description: The backend used to select and activate the converter that creates the output file. Usually named according to the output format (e.g., html5)

docdate.label: :docdate:
docdate.description: Last modified date of the source document. Example: 2019-01-04

docdatetime.label: :docdatetime:
docdatetime.description: Last modified date and time of the source document. Example: 2019-01-04 19:26:06 UTC

doctime.label: :doctime:
doctime.description: Last modified time of the source document. Example: 19:26:06 UTC

docyear.label: :docyear:
docyear.description: Year that the document was last modified. Example: 2021

localdate.label: :localdate:
localdate.description: Date when the document was converted. Example: 2019-02-17

localdatetime.label: :localdatetime:
localdatetime.description: Date and time when the document was converted. Example: 2019-02-17 19:31:05 UTC

localtime.label: :localtime:
localtime.description: Time when the document was converted. Example: 19:31:05 UTC

localyear.label: :localyear:
localyear.description: Year when the document was converted. Example: 2021

outfilesuffix.label: :outfilesuffix:
outfilesuffix.description: File extension of output file, including dot (.), such as .html.

attribute-missing.label: :attribute-missing:
attribute-missing.description: Controls how missing attribute references are handled. Default: skip

attribute-undefined.label: :attribute-undefined:
attribute-undefined.description: Controls how attribute unassignments are handled. Default: drop-line

compat-mode.label: :compat-mode:
compat-mode.description: Controls when the legacy parsing mode is used to parse the document.

experimental.label: :experimental:
experimental.description: Enables Button and Menu UI Macros and the Keyboard Macro.

reproducible.label: :reproducible:
reproducible.description: Prevents last-updated date from being added to HTML footer or DocBook info element. Useful for storing the output in a source code control system as it prevents spurious changes every time you convert the document.

skip-front-matter.label: :skip-front-matter:
skip-front-matter.description: Consume YAML-style frontmatter at top of document and store it in front-matter attribute.

appendix-caption.label: :appendix-caption:
appendix-caption.description: Label added before an appendix title. Default: Appendix

appendix-number.label: :appendix-number:
appendix-number.description: Sets the seed value for the appendix number sequence. Implied: @

appendix-refsig.label: :appendix-refsig:
appendix-refsig.description: Signifier added to Appendix title cross references. Default: Appendix

caution-caption.label: :caution-caption:
caution-caption.description: Text used to label CAUTION admonitions when icons aren’t enabled. Default: Caution

chapter-number.label: :chapter-number:
chapter-number.description: Sets the seed value for the chapter number sequence.[1] Book doctype only. Implied: 0

chapter-refsig.label: :chapter-refsig:
chapter-refsig.description: Signifier added to Chapter titles in cross references. Book doctype only. Default: Chapter

chapter-signifier.label: :chapter-signifier:
chapter-signifier.description: Label added to level-1 section titles (chapters). Book doctype only.

example-caption.label: :example-caption:
example-caption.description: Text used to label example blocks. Default: Example

example-number.label: :example-number:
example-number.description: Sets the seed value for the example number sequence. Implied: 0

figure-caption.label: :figure-caption:
figure-caption.description: Text used to label images and figures. Default: Figure

figure-number.label: :figure-number:
figure-number.description: Sets the seed value for the figure number sequence. Implied: 0

important-caption.label: :important-caption:
important-caption.description: Text used to label IMPORTANT admonitions when icons are not enabled. Default: Important

lang.label: :lang:
lang.description: Language tag specified on document element of the output document. Refer to the lang and xml:lang attributes section of the HTML specification to learn about the acceptable values for this attribute. Implied: en

last-update-label.label: :last-update-label:
last-update-label.description: Text used for “Last updated” label in footer. Default: Last updated

listing-caption.label: :listing-caption:
listing-caption.description: Text used to label listing blocks.

listing-number.label: :listing-number:
listing-number.description: Sets the seed value for the listing number sequence. Implied: 0

manname-title.label: :manname-title:
manname-title.description: Label for program name section in the man page. Implied: Name

nolang.label: :nolang:
nolang.description: Prevents lang attribute from being added to root element of the output document.

note-caption.label: :note-caption:
note-caption.description: Text used to label NOTE admonitions when icons aren’t enabled. Default: Note

part-refsig.label: :part-refsig:
part-refsig.description: Signifier added to Part titles in cross references. Book doctype only. Default: Part

part-signifier.label: :part-signifier:
part-signifier.description: Label added to level-0 section titles (parts). Book doctype only.

preface-title.label: :preface-title:
preface-title.description: Title text for an anonymous preface when doctype is book.

section-refsig.label: :section-refsig:
section-refsig.description: Signifier added to title of numbered sections in cross reference text. Default: Section

table-caption.label: :table-caption:
table-caption.description: Text of label prefixed to table titles. Default: Table

table-frame.label: :table-frame:
table-frame.description: Draws a border around the table. Default: all

table-grid.label: :table-grid:
table-grid.description: Draws boundary lines between rows and columns. Default: all

table-number.label: :table-number:
table-number.description: Sets the seed value for the table number sequence. Implied: 0

table-stripes.label: :table-stripes:
table-stripes.description: Controls row shading (via background color). Default: none

tip-caption.label: :tip-caption:
tip-caption.description: Text used to label TIP admonitions when icons aren’t enabled. Default: Tip

toc-title.label: :toc-title:
toc-title.description: Title for table of contents. Default: Table of Contents

untitled-label.label: :untitled-label:
untitled-label.description: Default document title if document doesn’t have a document title. Default: Untitled

version-label.label: :version-label:
version-label.description: See Version Label Attribute. Default: Version

warning-caption.label: :warning-caption:
warning-caption.description: Text used to label TIP admonitions when icons aren’t enabled. Default: Warning

app-name.label: :app-name:
app-name.description: Adds application-name meta element for mobile devices inside HTML document head.

author.label: :author:
author.description: Can be set automatically via the author info line or explicitly. See Author Information.

authorinitials.label: :authorinitials:
authorinitials.description: Derived from the author attribute by default. See Author Information.

authors.label: :authors:
authors.description: Can be set automatically via the author info line or explicitly as a comma-separated value list. See Author Information.

copyright.label: :copyright:
copyright.description: Adds copyright meta element in HTML document head.

description.label: :description:
description.description: Adds description meta element in HTML document head.

email.label: :email:
email.description: Can be any inline macro, such as a URL. See Author Information.

front-matter.label: :front-matter:
front-matter.description: If skip-front-matter is set via the API or CLI, any YAML-style frontmatter skimmed from the top of the document is stored in this attribute.

keywords.label: :keywords:
keywords.description: Adds keywords meta element in HTML document head.

orgname.label: :orgname:
orgname.description: Adds <orgname> element value to DocBook info element.

title.label: :title:
title.description: Value of <title> element in HTML <head> or main DocBook <info> of output document. Used as a fallback when the document title is not specified. See title attribute.

idprefix.label: :idprefix:
idprefix.description: Prefix of auto-generated section IDs. See Change the ID prefix. Default: _

idseparator.label: :idseparator:
idseparator.description: Word separator used in auto-generated section IDs. See Change the ID word separator. Default: _

leveloffset.label: :leveloffset:
leveloffset.description: Increases or decreases level of headings below assignment. A leading + or - makes the value relative.

partnums.label: :partnums:
partnums.description: Enables numbering of parts. See Number book parts. Book doctype only.

sectanchors.label: :sectanchors:
sectanchors.description: Adds anchor in front of section title on mouse cursor hover.

sectids.label: :sectids:
sectids.description: Generates and assigns an ID to any section that does not have an ID. Enabled by default. See Disable ID generation.

sectlinks.label: :sectlinks:
sectlinks.description: Turns section titles into self-referencing links.

sectnums.label: :sectnums:
sectnums.description: Numbers sections to depth specified by sectnumlevels.

sectnumlevels.label: :sectnumlevels:
sectnumlevels.description: Controls depth of section numbering. Implied: 3

title-separator.label: :title-separator:
title-separator.description: Character used to separate document title and subtitle.

toc.label: :toc:
toc.description: Turns on table of contents and specifies its location. If empty: auto

toclevels.label: :toclevels:
toclevels.description: Maximum section level to display. Implied: 2

fragment.label: :fragment:
fragment.description: Informs parser that document is a fragment and that it shouldn’t enforce proper section nesting.

asset-uri-scheme.label: :asset-uri-scheme:
asset-uri-scheme.description: Controls protocol used for assets hosted on a CDN. Implied: https

data-uri.label: :data-uri:
data-uri.description: Embed graphics as data-uri elements in HTML elements so file is completely self-contained.

docinfo.label: :docinfo:
docinfo.description: Read input from one or more DocBook info files. If empty: private

docinfodir.label: :docinfodir:
docinfodir.description: Location of docinfo files. Defaults to directory of source file if not specified.

docinfosubs.label: :docinfosubs:
docinfosubs.description: AsciiDoc substitutions that are applied to docinfo content. Implied: attributes

eqnums.label: :eqnums:
eqnums.description: Controls automatic equation numbering on LaTeX blocks in HTML output (MathJax). If the value is AMS, only LaTeX content enclosed in an \begin{equation}..\end{equation} container will be numbered. If the value is all, then all LaTeX blocks will be numbered. See equation numbering in MathJax. If empty: AMS

hide-uri-scheme.label: :hide-uri-scheme:
hide-uri-scheme.description: Hides URI scheme for raw links.

media.label: :media:
media.description: Specifies media type of output and enables behavior specific to that media type. PDF converter only. Implied: screen

notitle.label: :notitle:
notitle.description: Hides the doctitle in an embedded document. Mutually exclusive with the showtitle attribute.

pagewidth.label: :pagewidth:
pagewidth.description: Page width used to calculate the absolute width of tables in the DocBook output. Implied: 425

relfileprefix.label: :relfileprefix:
relfileprefix.description: The path prefix to add to relative xrefs.

relfilesuffix.label: :relfilesuffix:
relfilesuffix.description: The path suffix (e.g., file extension) to add to relative xrefs. Defaults to the value of the outfilesuffix attribute. (Preferred over modifying outfilesuffix). Example: .html

show-link-uri.label: :show-link-uri:
show-link-uri.description: Prints the URI of a link after the link text. PDF converter only.

showtitle.label: :showtitle:
showtitle.description: Displays the doctitle in an embedded document. Mutually exclusive with the notitle attribute.

stem.label: :stem:
stem.description: Enables mathematics processing and interpreter. If empty: asciimath

tabsize.label: :tabsize:
tabsize.description: Converts tabs to spaces in verbatim content blocks (e.g., listing, literal).

webfonts.label: :webfonts:
webfonts.description: Control whether webfonts are loaded when using the default stylesheet. When set to empty, uses the default font collection from Google Fonts. A non-empty value replaces the family query string parameter in the Google Fonts URL.

xrefstyle.label: :xrefstyle:
xrefstyle.description: Formatting style to apply to cross reference text.

iconfont-cdn.label: :iconfont-cdn:
iconfont-cdn.description: If not specified, uses the cdnjs.com service. Overrides CDN used to link to the Font Awesome stylesheet. Implied: default CDN URL

iconfont-name.label: :iconfont-name:
iconfont-name.description: Overrides the name of the icon font stylesheet. Implied: font-awesome

iconfont-remote.label: :iconfont-remote:
iconfont-remote.description: Allows use of a CDN for resolving the icon font. Empty by default. Only relevant used when value of icons attribute is font.

icons.label: :icons:
icons.description: Chooses images or font icons instead of text for admonitions. Any other value is assumed to be an icontype and sets the value to empty (image-based icons). If empty: image

iconsdir.label: :iconsdir:
iconsdir.description: Location of non-font-based image icons. Defaults to the icons folder under imagesdir if imagesdir is specified and iconsdir is not specified. Example: ./images/icons

icontype.label: :icontype:
icontype.description: File type for image icons. Only relevant when using image-based icons. Implied: png

imagesdir.label: :imagesdir:
imagesdir.description: Location of image files. Empty by default.

coderay-css.label: :coderay-css:
coderay-css.description: Controls whether CodeRay uses CSS classes or inline styles. Implied: class

coderay-linenums-mode.label: :coderay-linenums-mode:
coderay-linenums-mode.description: Sets how CodeRay inserts line numbers into source listings. Implied: table

coderay-unavailable.label: :coderay-unavailable:
coderay-unavailable.description: Tells processor not to load CodeRay.

highlightjsdir.label: :highlightjsdir:
highlightjsdir.description: Location of the highlight.js source code highlighter library. Implied: default CDN URL

highlightjs-theme.label: :highlightjs-theme:
highlightjs-theme.description: Name of theme used by highlight.js. Implied: github

prettifydir.label: :prettifydir:
prettifydir.description: Location of non-CDN prettify source code highlighter library. Implied: default CDN URL

prettify-theme.label: :prettify-theme:
prettify-theme.description: Name of theme used by prettify. Implied: prettify

prewrap.label: :prewrap:
prewrap.description: Wrap wide code listings. Empty by default

pygments-css.label: :pygments-css:
pygments-css.description: Controls whether Pygments uses CSS classes or inline styles. Implied: class

pygments-linenums-mode.label: :pygments-linenums-mode:
pygments-linenums-mode.description: Sets how Pygments inserts line numbers into source listings. Implied: table

pygments-style.label: :pygments-style:
pygments-style.description: Name of style used by Pygments. Implied: default

pygments-unavailable.label: :pygments-unavailable:
pygments-unavailable.description: Tells the processor not to load Pygments.

source-highlighter.label: :source-highlighter:
source-highlighter.description: Specifies source code highlighter. Any other value is permitted, but must be supported by a custom syntax highlighter adapter.

source-indent.label: :source-indent:
source-indent.description: Normalize block indentation in source code listings.

source-language.label: :source-language:
source-language.description: Default language for source code blocks.

source-linenums-option.label: :source-linenums-option:
source-linenums-option.description: Turns on line numbers for source code listings.

copycss.label: :copycss:
copycss.description: Copy CSS files to output. Empty by default. Only relevant when the linkcss attribute is set.

css-signature.label: :css-signature:
css-signature.description: Assign value to id attribute of HTML <body> element. Preferred approach is to assign an ID to document title.

linkcss.label: :linkcss:
linkcss.description: Links to stylesheet instead of embedding it. Can’t be unset in SECURE mode.

max-width.label: :max-width:
max-width.description: Constrains maximum width of document body. Not recommended. Use CSS stylesheet instead. Examples: 55em, 12cm

stylesheet.label: :stylesheet:
stylesheet.description: CSS stylesheet file name. Empty by default. An empty value tells the converter to use the default stylesheet.

toc-class.label: :toc-class:
toc-class.description: CSS class on the table of contents container. Implied: toc, or toc2 if toc=left

man-linkstyle.label: :man-linkstyle:
man-linkstyle.description: Link style in man page output. Implied: blue R <>

mansource.label: :mansource:
mansource.description: Source (e.g., application and version) the man page describes.

manmanual.label: :manmanual:
manmanual.description: Manual name displayed in the man page footer.
